meaningMnemonic: You chase a <radical>turkey</radical> up a <radical>tree</radical> to <kanji>collect</kanji> it. At least, you will once you've <kanji>gather</kanji>ed enough turkeys into this one tree.
readingMnemonic: Once you've <kanji>collect</kanji>ed enough turkeys, you're going to turn them into a <reading>shoe</reading> (しゅう). Maybe even two shoes, but that will mean <kanji>gather</kanji>ing even more turkeys!
